item.title: 新理事暗示日本央行可能上调物价前景
item.description: 日本央行的一位最新董事会成员暗示，该央行可能在本月上调对通胀的看法，这一结果将使今年再次加息的可能性保持开放。【原文：One of the Bank of Japan’s newest board members alluded to a possible upward revision to the central bank’s inflation view this month, an outcome that would keep open the possibility of another rate increase this year.】

item.title: 亚马逊 "Prime Day "早些时候的消费额比 2024 年下降了 14
item.description: 据管理着各种产品类别中 50 个品牌的 Momentum Commerce 公司称，亚马逊公司的 Prime Day 销售额在活动开始的前四个小时比去年促销开始时下降了近 14%。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Prime Day sales fell almost 14% in the first four hours of the event compared with the start of last year’s sale, according to Momentum Commerce, which manages 50 brands in a variety of product categories.】

item.title: 鲁比奥冒名顶替者利用人工智能和信号联系外国官员
item.description: 有人冒充国务卿马可-卢比奥使用人工智能生成的语音技术和一个假冒的 Signal 账户与外国官员和至少一名国会议员联系，这是冒名顶替者模仿美国高级官员的最新案例。【原文：Someone pretending to be Secretary of State Marco Rubio used AI-generated voice technology and a fake Signal account to contact foreign officials and at least one member of Congress, the latest case of impostors mimicking senior US officials.】

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉接待莫迪，希望将印度打造成主要贸易伙伴
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦希望深化与世界上人口最多的国家印度的贸易关系。在他准备周二在巴西利亚接待印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）之际，问题是如何实现这一目标。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva wants to deepen trade ties with India, the world’s most populous nation. The question as he prepares to host Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Brasilia on Tuesday is how to go about it.】

item.title: 足球投资人称 "流氓银行家 "掩盖真相毁了合并案
item.description: 陷入困境的足球俱乐部老板约翰-特斯托（John Textor）和他的支持者们正因合并失败而互相起诉，指控这位美国商人在与受制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁米哈伊尔-弗里德曼（Mikhail Fridman）的关系问题上受到了欺骗。【原文：Embattled football club owner John Textor and his backers are suing each other over a failed merger, with allegations that the American businessman was deceived over connections to sanctioned Russian billionaire Mikhail Fridman.】

item.title: 特朗普放松管制，加拿大矿业巨头寻求美国项目
item.description: 加拿大矿业巨头弗兰克-朱斯特拉（Frank Giustra）正在美国寻找项目，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统削减了繁文缛节，铜和黄金等金属的前景依然光明。【原文：Canadian mining magnate Frank Giustra is scouring for projects in the US as President Donald Trump cuts red tape and the outlook for metals like copper and gold remains bright.】

item.title: 英国石油公司计划暂时维持德国炼油厂原油装置的运行
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）原计划关闭盖尔森基兴炼油厂（德国两家炼油厂中规模较大的一家）的一个原油加工装置，但目前该装置仍将继续运行，因为市场有助于提高该厂的盈利能力。【原文：BP Plc will for now keep running a crude-processing unit that it had planned to close at its Gelsenkirchen refinery — the bigger of its two plants in Germany — as the market contributes to the plant’s profitability.】

item.title: 希望贸易谈判有谈判空间，股市保持稳定
item.description: 美国股市周二开盘持稳，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税警告给人们留下了希望，即他仍对谈判持开放态度。【原文：US equities were steady at the open on Tuesday as President Donald Trump’s latest tariff warnings left room for hope that he was still open to negotiations.】

item.title: 特斯拉下滑后，凯茜-伍德回击马斯克的最新争议
item.description: 凯西-伍德（Cathie Wood）是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的长期支持者，本周伊始，这位亿万富翁宣布将组建一个新政党，导致特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Cathie Wood, a longtime backer of Elon Musk, is standing by the Tesla Inc. chief executive after a turbulent start to the week that saw shares in the electric vehicle-maker plunge after the billionaire businessman announced he’s forming a new political party.】

item.title: Trafigura 预付 2 亿美元收购艾芬豪旗下刚果铜矿公司
item.description: Trafigura 集团同意支付 2 亿美元购买位于刚果民主共和国的艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. ）冶炼厂的铜阳极，该冶炼厂将于 9 月份投产。【原文：Trafigura Group agreed to pay $200 million for copper anodes from an Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. smelter in the Democratic Republic of Congo that’s due to start up in September.】

item.title: 三名男子因瓦格纳组织支持的伦敦纵火袭击而被判有罪
item.description: 伦敦的一个陪审团裁定三名男子有罪，他们在俄罗斯的支持下纵火袭击了一家公司在伦敦的仓库，这家公司向乌克兰供应货物，包括 Starlink 卫星设备。【原文：A London jury found three men guilty for carrying out a Russia backed arson attack on a London warehouse of a firm that supplied goods, including Starlink satellite equipment, to Ukraine.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体第三次提交 ETF 申请，进一步进军加密货币领域
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. is plowing deeper into the cryptocurrencies space with a new filing for an exchange-traded fund that would hold a number of digital assets including Bitcoin, Ether, Solana and others.】

item.title: X 称印度政府下令封锁路透社账户
item.description: X 全球治理团队发表声明称，在印度政府下令封禁数千个账户（包括路透社等国际媒体的账户）后，X 对印度的媒体法律表示严重关切。【原文：X raised serious concerns about India’s media laws after the government ordered it to block thousands of accounts, including from international media like Reuters, according to a statement issued by their global governance team.】

item.title: 华尔街银行股暴涨引发汇丰银行下调评级
item.description: 汇丰银行对美国最大的三家银行股持谨慎态度，因为这三家银行股的涨势创下了历史新高。【原文：HSBC is turning cautious on three of the biggest US bank stocks following a record rally that’s brought the group within shouting distance of an all-time high.】

item.title: SoFi 将通过新基金让客户接触 OpenAI 和 SpaceX
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc. 表示，该公司正在增加新的私人市场基金，允许零售客户投资于包括 SpaceX、OpenAI 和 Epic Games 在内的紧密持股公司。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. said it’s adding new private-markets funds that will allow retail clients to invest in closely held companies including SpaceX, OpenAI and Epic Games.】

item.title: 新山公司首次实施二级市场战略的目标是 20 亿美元
item.description: 新山资本（New Mountain Capital）的目标是为新的二级市场战略筹集多达 20 亿美元的资金，该战略将支持其他赞助商的单一资产延续基金。【原文：New Mountain Capital aims to raise as much as $2 billion for a new secondaries strategy that will back single-asset continuation funds from other sponsors.】

item.title: 沃达康、Remgro 向 7.43 亿美元光纤交易批准迈进
item.description: 南非反垄断监督机构将不会在竞争上诉法院反对沃达康集团有限公司（Vodacom Group Ltd.）和雷姆格罗有限公司（Remgro Ltd.）之间价值 132 亿兰特（7.43 亿美元）的光纤交易，这增加了交易继续进行的可能性。【原文：South Africa’s anti-trust watchdog will not oppose the 13.2 billion rand ($743 million) fiber transaction between Vodacom Group Ltd. and Remgro Ltd. at the Competition Appeal Court, increasing chances that the deal will go ahead.】

item.title: 丹格特炼油厂有望在年底前加工 100% 的尼日利亚原油
item.description: 丹格特工业有限公司（Dangote Industries Ltd.）预计，到今年年底，非洲最大的炼油厂将完全依赖尼日利亚原油，此举将取代每天数十万桶的进口石油。【原文：Dangote Industries Ltd. expects Africa’s biggest refinery to rely totally on Nigerian crude by the end of the year, a move that would replace hundreds of thousands of barrels a day of imported oil.】

item.title: 政治困境之后，英国住宅建筑商股票对博鳌亚洲论坛颇具吸引力
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）分析师认为，上周有关英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）未来的猜测引发了英国住宅建筑商股票的下跌，这提供了一个买入机会。【原文：A drop in UK homebuilder stocks fanned by last week’s speculation about the future of Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves has provided a buying opportunity, according to Bank of America Corp. analysts.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 SiPearl 在欧盟主权人工智能推动下融资 1.3 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟支持的芯片制造商 SiPearl 已从包括台湾国泰创投（Cathay Venture）在内的投资者那里筹集了 1.3 亿欧元（约合 1.52 亿美元）的资金，因为欧洲正在推动技术主权。【原文：European Union-backed chipmaker SiPearl has raised €130 million ($152 million) from investors including Taiwan’s Cathay Venture, as Europe pushes for technological sovereignty.】

item.title: 优步交易员抛开机器人出租车风险，股价再创新高
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. investors are brushing aside potential threats from self-driving competition to bet that the company has plenty of room to expand in the near term.】

item.title: 智利 6 月消费者物价跌幅为预期的两倍
item.description: 智利 6 月份的消费价格降幅是预期的两倍，将年通胀率推至 9 月份以来的最低点，并助长了央行将在本月恢复降息的预期。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices fell twice as much as expected in June, pushing annual inflation to its lowest since September and fueling expectations that the central bank will resume interest rate cuts this month.】

item.title: M&S 公司称 4 月份的网络攻击是由第三方冒名顶替造成的
item.description: 据马莎百货集团董事长阿奇-诺曼（Archie Norman）称，导致该公司运营中断数周的网络攻击是该零售商的一个第三方用户 "精心假冒 "的结果。【原文：The cyberattack that derailed Marks and Spencer Group Plc’s operations for weeks was the result of a “sophisticated impersonation” of one of the retailer’s third-party users, according to Chairman Archie Norman.】

item.title: 关税紧张局势转向其他地区，越南股市反弹
item.description: 越南股市连续第三天反弹，创下三年来的新高，因为贸易紧张局势已转向其他亚洲国家，这些国家在等待与美国达成协议的同时也面临着更高的关税。【原文：Vietnam’s stocks rallied for a third consecutive day to a three-year high as trade tensions shifted to other Asian nations facing higher tariffs while waiting to strike a deal with the US.】

item.title: 降温需求抑制新西兰房屋建筑成本
item.description: 由于新建住宅需求降温抑制了建筑业的工资和材料价格，新西兰第二季度的住宅建筑成本小幅上升。【原文：New Zealand home-building costs rose modestly in the second quarter as cooling demand for new dwellings suppresses wages and material prices in the construction industry.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚维持利率不变，紧急增税将推高房价
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行维持借贷成本不变，因为政府通过增税来控制不断膨胀的预算赤字的努力很可能会引发暂时性的通胀飙升。【原文：Romania’s central bank left borrowing costs unchanged as government efforts to rein in the ballooning budget deficit with tax hikes are likely to trigger a temporary spike in inflation.】

item.title: 美国最新就业报告发出警示信号
item.description: 最新的美国就业报告中出现了一系列值得警惕的信号，包括私营部门的招聘疲软和集中，以及工作时间的减少，这些都凸显了就业市场的脆弱。【原文：An assortment of cautionary signals emerged in the latest US jobs report, including weak and concentrated hiring in the private sector as well as a dip in hours worked that underscore a fragile job market.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油发货量降至二月份以来最低点
item.description:
炼油运行的增长速度快于产量的增长速度，削弱了出口

。【原文：

Refining runs are rising faster than production, eating into exports

】

item.title: 挪威150亿美元石油赌注显示对长期需求的信心
item.description:
无论国际能源机构的预测如何，生产商都一心想从大陆架上榨取更多油桶。【原文：

Producers are intent on squeezing more barrels from the continental shelf regardless of International Energy Agency forecasts.

】

item.title: 最新关税暂停显示特朗普疯狂交易的局限性
item.description: 在 4 月 2 日的 "解放日 "上，唐纳德-特朗普大谈在美国工人和公司被 "掠夺 "了几十年之后，贸易终于要向有利于美国的方向倾斜了。在这位总统看来，不受约束的关税将很快使美国成为 "一个完全不同的国家"。【原文：On “Liberation Day” on April 2, Donald Trump gushed about how trade was finally going to tilt in America’s favor after decades of its workers and companies being “plundered.” For the president, unfettered tariffs would soon make the US “an entirely different country.”】
